Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1700 Broadway is a recently renovated Class A building with a two story lobby with granite floors, marble walls and high ceilings.  Building services include a Starbucks, Wells Fargo, a sandwich shop and a printing shop.  Located one block from RTD and Civic Center Station.  The building is also across the street from the internationally renowned Brown Palace Hotel.
